Class TextViewHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.Handler
      • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.utils.loader.handler.TextViewHandler
  • public class TextViewHandler
extends Handler
    A Handler to set the TextView on separate thread.
